AWAKE is a pioneer in the energy snack space. Our beloved bars, bites and bits are infused with the same caffeine as coffee in a delicious chocolate snack with no caffeine bitterness, so we delight consumers by delivering extra energy with unmatched taste.

Since launching the first and only Caffeinated Chocolate in 2012 AWAKE has become a go to brand for those looking to get more done, and have more fun. Available in over 20,000 locations across North America, awakechocolate.com and Amazon, thousands of people love AWAKE Chocolate and rely on ...

s: November 25, 2024 - Toronto, Canada-based Awake Chocolate recently released a Dark Chocolate Variety Pack, offering an array of treats to consumers.
